summary: This is a court order from Judge Alison J. Nathan in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case, scheduling a telephone conference for October 21, 2021 to discuss jury selection matters. The order provides public and private dial-in information for the proceeding and prohibits recording or rebroadcasting.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case referenced in the court order.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: The judge issuing the order scheduling the telephone conference and setting the rules for public access.

events.title: Jury Selection Telephone Conference
events.description: The court schedules a telephone conference to discuss jury selection matters for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

keyFacts: The court scheduled a telephone conference for October 21, 2021 to discuss jury selection in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The order provides public access to the audio feed via specific phone numbers and an access code.
A separate, private dial-in number was to be provided to counsel, the defendant, alleged victims, and family members.
Photographing, recording, or rebroadcasting the proceeding is prohibited by law and may result in fines or sanctions.
